The extent of the biosphere is about:
options: 11,000 m below the surface of the earth to 9,000 m above the mean sea level
9,000 m below the surface of the earth to 9,000 m above the mean sea level
10,000 m below the surface of the earth to 10,000 m above the mean sea level
6,000 m below the surface of the earth to 8,000 m above the mean sea level
correct: 11,000 m below the surface of the earth to 9,000 m above the mean sea level
